description: The initiative focuses on sustainable farming practices through holistic management, emphasizing the importance of water conservation, biodiversity, and community involvement. The project leader manages nearly 300 hectares of land, integrating livestock and diverse agricultural methods. The goal is to create a model farm that not only produces high-quality, pasture-raised meat but also serves as a learning center for others interested in regenerative agriculture. The initiative aims for economic sustainability while fostering a supportive community.
name: Biograssfed
